title: Rookie Inspector

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Check someone at night. You will learn five random roles,

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- At the start of Night 3, choose one of the following to be added to your ability:
> - one of which will be your target's role. If they're not a member of the Town, they'll learn they were investigated, and the result you were given. Your results can only contain roles that can exist.
> - the majority of which will be able to win with your target, given your target's current win condition.
> - all of which will have post numbers no more than 500 higher or lower than your target's role's post number.
